name: nfs1
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wi(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wi(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wsb(s1, s0, w0), wal(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

|- wnf(s0, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

comment: If ` y ` is not free in ` ph ` , ` x ` is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
